item.description:
Boston/Cambridge SEO Networking Group

We invite local Boston seo, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England area to join us.

Location:

Robbins Library Arlington, MA

Agenda:

6:30pm to 7pm: Open Networking

Business Card Buffet: drop you card on the networking buffet

7pm to 7:30: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?

7:30 - 8:00 Guest Speaker

Topic:
Using analytic tools for SEO & how to identify the right long-tail keywords that will help you identify and get more of your most valuable traffic.

Bio:

Christina Inge is a marketing consultant with over 10 years'
experience in content creation, web technologies, and project
management. She is adept at finding creative ways to maximize the
small marketing budgets of startups and nonprofits. Her articles on
marketing have appeared in trade publications, and she is a speaker on
cutting-edge marketing practices. Her areas of expertise include
boosting clickthrough and conversion rates for paid search campaigns,
as well as best practices in organic search. She also consults for
companies on product go-to-market plans, email marketing strategy and
implementation, online lead conversion and lead generation analysis
and optimization, and product positioning.

Christina has led workshops on wireless energy management systems at
the UMass Sustainable Energy Summit, on cause marketing at the Center
for Nonprofit Success' Boston Fundraising Summit, on Web 2.0
technologies and event marketing at PodCampNH, and on boosting
conversion at eMetrics Toronto.

Prior to her work in marketing, Christina was a journalist for many
years, writing for MSN.com, Succeed, and a variety of general and
special-interest magazines. A Summa Cum Laude graduate of the
University of Maryland with a Bachelor's in English, Christina also
hold a Master's in Instructional Technology, focusing on designing
optimal, user-friendly online learning experiences for adult students,
from the University of Wyoming.

Follow Her:
LinkedIn
AMA Boston Profile
Twitter @christinainge

8:15: Additional Q & A, What's Working, & Challenge Questions


8:45pm The End

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!


The Cambridge SEO MeetUp

----------------------------------
Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend at this new big meeting room.

Food Event Sponsors:

SEO Pro's, will work for food! Contact us about sponsoring the event with goodies and drinks in exchange for publicity.

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Search Engine Optimization SEO Networking Meetup
